detectors.description:
YFTRUST.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#78-86) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- from != msg.sender && allowance[from][msg.sender] != uint256(- 1) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#79)

detectors.description:
YFTRUST.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,bool,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#112-134) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool,string)(nonce == nonces[holder] ++,invalid-nonce) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#130)
	- amount = uint256(- 1) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#131)
detectors.markdown:
[YFTRUST.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,bool,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#L112-L134) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [require(bool,string)(nonce == nonces[holder] ++,invalid-nonce)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#L130)
	- [amount = uint256(- 1)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#L131)

detectors.description:
YFTRUST.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,bool,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#112-134) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(expiry == 0 || now <= expiry,permit-expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#129)

detectors.description: Constant YFTRUST.version (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#32) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES
Variable YFTRUST.DOMAIN_SEPARATOR (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#52) is not in mixedCase

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFTRUST.sol#17-21)
